instruction: Explain why this policy was introduced.
input: The single-use plastic reduction policy in the UK
output: The single-use plastic reduction policy in the UK was introduced to help reduce waste in order to protect the environment. It is also intended to help reduce the amount of plastic that is produced and discarded, ultimately impacting climate change. This policy is part of the increased public awareness of the effects that plastic waste has on the environment, and is aimed at increasing the use of more sustainable alternatives.
